introduction.heading: Kids First Data Catalog
introduction.text: The Kids First Data Catalog supports the Kids First Data Resource Center by providing digital object services that allow interoperability between data commons, including authentication and authorization for controlled access data. For more information about the overall Kids First Data Resource Center see https://kidsfirstdrc.org.

buttons.name: Define Data Field
buttons.body: The Data Catalog defines the data in a general way. Please study the dictionary before you start browsing.
buttons.label: Learn more

buttons.name: Explore Data
buttons.body: The Exploration Page gives you insights and a clear overview under selected factors.
buttons.label: Explore data

buttons.name: Access Data
buttons.body: Use our selected tool to filter out the data you need.
buttons.label: Query data

buttons.name: Analyze Data
buttons.body: Analyze your selected cases using Jupyter Notebooks in our secure cloud environment
buttons.label: Run analysis

login.title: Kids First Data Catalog

For more information about the overall Kids First Data Resource Center see https://kidsfirstdrc.org.
login.contact: If you have any questions about access or the registration process, please contact
